home.heroSubtitle: Write down how you feel today. We’ll reframe your thoughts and create a prayer just for you.
home.footer1: “Pray for You” turns your reflections into encouragement and prayer.
home.footer2: Spend time with family and friends, talk, have fun, get outside,
home.footer3: and do things that bring you joy.
